comments.body: If you think the type definitions for version 3 will need to be updated in the future, please follow the guide [here](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#i-want-to-update-a-package-to-a-new-major-version). Otherwise, I will go ahead and merge this.
I don't think the version 3 definitions will need any updates. Hence I would be glad if you could merge. Thanks!
This will have the effect that you will get notified on every issue and PR related to react-map-gl types. Just something to be aware of.
Is this needed? It looks like the existing definitions are fine without this reference?

I had an issue with [next.js](https://nextjs.org) where tsc couldn't find definitions for some types used in this file, such as `CanvasRenderingContext2D`, `WebGLContextEvent`, `ImageData`. Adding this reference to the DOM lib fixed the issue.
Where did you get all these props from? In the documentation and the source code, I only see `id`, `type`, and `children`. Or am I missing something?

In the source code of react-map-gl ,sourceOptions is provdied implictly and extra properties will be added through the loop.
https://github.com/uber/react-map-gl/blob/c71b0d4b9da65bdeaa4a077d85b4658654b68100/src/components/source.js#L96
I add these extra properties and set them as optional and people could pass extra properties which are defined by mapbox-gl with type checking.
